transcript:
Customer: Hello
Executive: Ha namaste.
Customer: Ha sir good afternoon sir Arun pesura sir India Mart call panniruken.
Executive: Sollungamma.
Customer: Ha sir actually customer care call pannirunthinga athu regarding than call pannirunthan. Sollunga sir enna issue sir.
Executive: Chennai da Bangalore da ma.
Customer: Puriyala.
Executive: Chennai address idhu.
Customer: Okay K and N enterprises melur irukulla sir athu sir. A velur da.
Customer: Aama aama sir.
Executive: Enna ma oru number kodukuren.
Customer: Sari sir.
Executive: Anga anga pesunga.
Customer: Kodunga sir.
Executive: 86100
Customer: 86100
Executive: 70
Customer: 70
Executive: 994
Customer: 994 ivanga than handle pannittu irukanga Chennai oru Geetha antu.
Executive: Nandakumar number koduthanga sollunga sir.
Customer: Sari sir sari ok sir.
Executive: Correct sapa.
summary:
